# Right-to-Left Intracardiac Shunts



## Clinical Manifestations

Clinical appearance depends on the:

* Degree of shunting



## Management

Physiological aims:

* Maintain preload
* Systemic vasoconstriction  
Use of α-agonist to ↑ SVR & ↓ systemic ventricle CO.
* Negative inotropy
